SourceProxy.label: Append Attributes Over Time
SourceProxy.name: AppendAttributesOverTime

Documentation.long_help: Copies geometry from first input. Puts all of the arrays of each timesteps into the output.
Documentation.short_help: Puts all input arrays into the single output.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Append Attributes Over Time filter takes multiple input data sets with the same geometry and merges their attributes to produce a single output containing all these attributes. Any inputs without the same number of points and cells as the first input are ignored. Each array of each timestep of each input is copied to the output. Note that the output is not a temporal dataset.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the filter.
